arts.ttl: Everton vs Mansfield Town player ratings - Armstrong impresses
arts.sum: Everton beat Mansfield Town 2-0 to advance to the third round of the Carabao Cup.

arts.ttl: Superb Alcaraz opener helps Everton avoid slip-up against Mansfield
arts.sum: Second-half goals from Charly Alcaraz and substitute Beto saw Everton ease into the Carabao Cup third round with a routine 2-0 win over League One Mansfield.

arts.ttl: Beto wraps up routine cup win for Everton against League One Mansfield
arts.sum: Charly Alcaraz opened the scoring for the home side at the Hill Dickinson Stadium.

arts.ttl: Talking points for Everton vs Mansfield Town
arts.sum: This will be the first ever cup game at the Hill Dickinson Stadium which has been sold out.

arts.ttl: That’s a target’: Everton star states trophy ambition ahead of Mansfield Town cup clash
arts.sum: Everton forward Iliman Ndiaye has spoken of his ambition to win silverware with the Toffees. David Moyes’ side welcome Mansfield Town to BMD this evening for the second round of the League Cup. Speaking ahead of the tie against the League One side, Ndiaye stated that ending the trophy drought is a ‘target’ of his. In a report by the Liverpool Echo, Ndiaye revealed that the ground move can positively impact the hunt for success. He stated, “That’s a target. arts.ttl: Everton vs Mansfield Town: Preview and Predicted Lineups
arts.sum: Everton brace for cup action at the Hill Dickinson Stadium for the first time as Mansfield Town pay a visit.

arts.ttl: Everton vs Mansfield Town – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Everton play their first ever cup match at the new Hill Dickinson Stadium on Wednesday night, welcoming League One side Mansfield Town for the second round of the Carabao Cup. After securing a historic first win at the venue against Brighton on Sunday, the mood on Merseyside is positive. arts.ttl: Everton vs Mansfield Town – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Everton and Mansfield Town meet for the first time in their histories on Wednesday night in the second round of the Carabao Cup. The historic fixture will also be the first ever cup tie played at the new Hill Dickinson Stadium.
